1022256347017084928.Title: Walk. Ride. Rodeo.
1022256347017084928.Text: Amberley Snyder had 3 goals after being paralyzed in a car accident. The nationally ranked barrel racer vowed to WALK, RIDE, RODEO . Produced by NETFLIX and Poke Prod LLC, it is filming now into August and stars Bailey Chase (Longmire), Spencer Locke, Missi Pyle, and Alyn Lind.
